quotes.quote: Be not ashamed of thy virtues; honor's a good brooch to wear in a man's hat at all times.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: The difference between a moral man and a man of honor is that the latter regrets a discreditable act, even when it has worked and he has not been caught.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Don't look for more honor than your learning merits.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: An honor is not diminished for being shared.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: Guard your honor. Let your reputation fall where it will. And outlive the bastards.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: If the truth doesn't save us, what does that say about us?
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: Reputation is what other people know about you. Honor is what you know about yourself.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobody's going to know whether you did it or not.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: What is left when honor is lost?
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: The louder he talked of his honor, the faster we counted our spoons.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Honor does not have to be defended.
quotes.author: Robert J. Sawyer

quotes.quote: Be honorable yourself if you wish to associate with honorable people.
quotes.author: Welsh Proverb
